TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HostSecurityManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许控制和自定义应用程序域的安全行为。

span.span: Allows the control and customization of security behavior for application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您创建一个新，公共语言运行时查询是否存在，它参与安全决策。When you create a new , the common language runtime queries the for the presence of a , which participates in making security decisions for the . 托管提供程序应实现继承自宿主安全管理器类。Host providers should implement a host security manager that inherits from the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个非常简单的实现。The following example shows a very simple implementation of a . [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#1)]

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明代码不能使用此类。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任代码继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

para.span: 某些成员时程序集加载、 显式或隐式调用。

span.span: Some members of a are called whenever an assembly is loaded, either implicitly or explicitly.

para.span: 并方法必须加载任何程序集，因为执行此操作将导致的成员正在以递归方式调用。

span.span: The and methods must not load any assemblies, because doing so will result in the members of the being recursively called.

para.span: 若要避免循环引用，应创建可能会导致要加载程序集，隐式或显式，派生的类的构造函数中的类的新实例。

span.span: To avoid circular references, you should create new instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either implicitly or explicitly, in the constructor of a class that derives from .

span.span: The get accessor for the property and the and methods are called whenever an assembly is loaded, and their subsequent loading of assemblies will cause circular references.

public: virtual System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ DetermineApplicationTrust(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ applicationEvidence, System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ activatorEvidence, System::Security::Policy::TrustManagerContext ^ context);

abstract member DetermineApplicationTrust : System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext -> System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust override this.DetermineApplicationTrust : System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext -> System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust

param.name: applicationEvidence
param.span: 要激活的应用程序的证据。

span.span: The evidence for the application to be activated.

param.name: activatorEvidence
param.span: 也可以是正在激活的应用程序域的证据。

span.span: Optionally, the evidence for the activating application domain.
The trust context.

summary.span: 决定是否应执行应用程序。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed.

returns.span: 一个对象，包含有关应用程序的信任信息。

span.span: An object that contains trust information about the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现调用应用程序安全管理器，以确定是否应执行应用程序。The base implementation calls the application security manager to determine if the application should be executed. 基实现不使用激活器证据。The base implementation does not use the activator evidence. 但是，重写的实现可能使用的激活器证据来确定尝试激活应用程序的应用程序域的安全证据。However, an overridden implementation could use the activator evidence to determine the security evidence for the application domain attempting to activate the application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义宿主安全管理器的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel DomainPolicy { get; }

Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DomainPolicy As PolicyLevel

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("AppDomain policy levels are obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取当前应用程序域的安全策略。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the security policy for the current application domain.

value.span: 当前应用程序域的安全策略。

span.span: The security policy for the current application domain.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此属性。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 此基实现总是返回 `null`。The base implementation always returns `null`. 此属性在调用创建时间。This property is called at creation time. 它使宿主可以提供当前策略。It allows a host to supply a policy for the current . 策略级别由以下内容组成：A policy level consists of the following: - 代码组的一组组织到取得 root 权限的单个树。A set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree. - 要指定要对其授予属于代码组的权限的代码组所引用的命名的权限集的一组。A set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group. - 完全受信任的程序集的列表。A list of fully trusted assemblies. > [!IMPORTANT] > 请参阅有关的继承者说明关键实现信息的类。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

exception.span: 此方法使用代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略，该策略在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已过时。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要使 CAS 策略与早期版本的 .NET Framework 兼容，请使用 [<legacyCasPolicy> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

summary.span: 获取表示与主机相关的安全策略组件的标志。

span.span: Gets the flag representing the security policy components of concern to the host.

value.span: 用于指定安全策略组件的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies security policy components.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此属性。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 此基实现总是返回 。The base implementation always returns . 派生的主机可以更改此属性时的一个子集值感兴趣。The derived host can change the value of this property when only a subset of the is of interest. 可能的子集包括 none、 被拒绝的集，策略级别和程序集证据。The possible subsets include none, the refused set, the policy level, and assembly evidence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义宿主安全管理器的属性。The following example shows how to override the property for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#2)]

Public Overridable Function GenerateAppDomainEvidence (evidenceType As Type) As EvidenceBase
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAppDomainEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType);
abstract member GenerateAppDomainEvidence : Type -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase override this.GenerateAppDomainEvidence : Type -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase

span.span: The evidence type.

summary.span: 请求应用程序域的特定证据类型。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the application domain.

returns.span: 请求的应用程序域证据。

span.span: The requested application domain evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 公共语言运行时调用此方法时指定类型的证据所需的当前。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current . 返回的值用作主机提供的证据，并且存储在的集合属性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the collection of the property. 可以使用方法以从集合中获取生成的证据。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the collection. 若要获取对此方法的回调，主机必须指定标记中属性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 此方法生成的证据的允许主机以延迟证据生成之前所需证据。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 版本 3.5 和更早版本中，已提供所需在加载时通过重写的证据方法。In the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我们建议你使用提供证据，而不是替代。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 方法会被回调仅对于类型的主机具有的重写中指定的证据方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 返回值为`null`指示主机无法生成此特定类型的证据。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义宿主安全管理器的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#6)]

span.span: The evidence type.
The target assembly.

summary.span: 请求程序集的特定证据类型。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the assembly.
The requested assembly evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 指定类型的证据所需的当前程序集时，公共语言运行时将调用此方法。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current assembly. 返回的值用作主机提供的证据，并且存储在属性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the property. 可以使用方法以获取从生成的证据属性。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the property. 若要获取对此方法的回调，主机必须指定标记中属性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 此方法生成的证据的允许主机以延迟证据生成之前所需证据。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本中，已提供所需在加载时通过重写的证据方法。In the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我们建议你使用提供证据，而不是替代。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 方法会被回调仅对于类型的主机具有的重写中指定的证据方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 返回值为`null`指示主机无法生成此特定类型的证据。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type.

summary.span: 确定主机可以为应用程序域提供哪些证据类型（如果请求了证据类型）。

span.span: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the application domain, if requested.
An array of evidence types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 此方法返回的类型确定是否返回到调用方法。The types returned by this method determine whether the method is called back into. 此列表中类型的状态并不意味着主机必须能够生成此证据类型，但它可能可以使用。The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to. 因此，最好是过度指定比下-指定此列表中的类型。For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.

The evidence to be used for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此方法。This method can be overridden in a derived class. 调用此方法时创建对象。This method is called whenever an object is created. `inputEvidence`参数是从公共语言运行时计算所得的证据。The `inputEvidence` parameter is the computed evidence from the common language runtime. 主机实现可以选择增加或减少证据。The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence. 返回值是要用于应用程序域的证据。The return value is the evidence to be used for the application domain. 基实现始终返回作为传递的证据对象`inputEvidence`参数。The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 请参阅有关的继承者说明关键实现信息的类。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

param.name: evidence

span.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: 根据指定的证据确定向代码授予什么权限。

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: 可由安全系统授予的权限集。

span.span: The permission set that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将调用安全策略引擎，为其提供指定的证据。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with the specified evidence. 由安全策略确定结果。The result is determined by the security policy.

span.span: is .
